file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-50-16-04 - FLASHLIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FLASHLIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal and installation of the flashlight assembly. B. There are four flashlights installed on the aircraft. The removal/installation procedures of this section are the same for all of them. C. The flashlights are installed in these locations: • On the copilot console. • On the cockpit partition, behind the pilot seat. • On the cockpit partition, over the attendant seat. • On the toilet forward partition, behind the last double seat. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-50-16-000-801-A FLASHLIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL FLASHLIGHT ASSEMBLY - INSTALLA- ALL 33-50-16-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-50-16 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-16-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FLASHLIGHT ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the flashlight assembly. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 224 Copilot console 223 Cockpit partition, behind the pilot seat Cockpit partition, over the attendant 223 seat Toilet forward partition, behind the last 262 double seat C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit and in the passenger cabin H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the FLASHLIGHT circuit breaker and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2/FLASHLIGHT). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Pull the flashlight (2), bottom first, off the cradle (1). (2) Remove the screws (3). (3) Carefully pull the cradle (1). (4) Disconnect the electrical connector (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-50-16 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Remove the cradle (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-50-16 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Flashlight Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONE ZONE 223 262 ZONE A A 223 A ZONE 224 A CAUTION 1. CRADLE 2. FLASHLIGHT 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 3. SCREW (2) LED (REF.) DET. A 145AMM330181A.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-50-16 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-50-16-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. FLASHLIGHT ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the flashlight assembly. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 224 Copilot console 223 Cockpit partition, behind the pilot seat Cockpit partition, over the attendant 223 seat Toilet forward partition, behind the last 262 double seat C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit and in the passenger cabin H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the electrical connector (4). (2) Put the cradle (1) in its installation position. (3) Install the screws (3). CAUTION: MAKE SURE THAT THE FLASHLIGHT (2) IS OFF. IF YOU DO NOT TURN OFF THE FLASHLIGHT BEFORE YOU PUT IT IN ITS CRADLE (1), THE FLASHLIGHT ASSEMBLY WILL OVERHEAT AND DAMAGE WILL OCCUR. (4) Fit the flashlight (2), head first, to the cradle (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-50-16 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the FLASHLIGHT circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 2/FLASHLIGHT). (2) Check if the flashlight LED is ON. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-50-16 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
